original_title: Real Men 24: All Play and No Work
overview: The hot daddies in All Play and No Work are no dull boys. When these men play they work up a sweat as they fuck and suck each other all night. Pantheon favorite Jay Taylor is on hand with newcummers Blade Hunter and Jack Hartford to work each other, and you, into a lather.
title: Real Men 24: All Play and No Work
